name: AVAssetResourceLoadingContentInformationRequest
desc: A query for retrieving essential information about a resource that an asset resource-loading request references.

items.name: var allowedContentTypes: [String]?
items.desc: The types of data that are accepted as a valid response for the requested resource.

items.name: var contentType: String?
items.desc: The UTI that specifies the type of data contained by the requested resource.

items.name: var contentLength: Int64
items.desc: The length, in bytes, of the requested resource.

items.name: var isByteRangeAccessSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether random access to arbitrary ranges of bytes of the resource is supported.

items.name: var renewalDate: Date?
items.desc: The date at which a new resource loading request will be issued for resources that expire, if the media system still requires it.
